title: When the Moon was Home to Strange Creatures
story: [excited] You won't believe this—back in 1835, the New York Sun ran a series claiming we found life on the Moon! These wild articles described bizarre lunar creatures like bat-like beavers and giant blue bipedal beings. The writer, Richard Adams Locke, had everyone convinced this was real, and it sparked a frenzy of excitement. People were captivated! Over 100,000 copies flew off the shelves, proving how easily the public could be mesmerized by a good story. But here’s the kicker: it was all a hoax! What if we’re still falling for it today? [pause:0.5s]
description: In 1835, the New York Sun claimed we found life on the Moon! Discover the wild hoax that captivated America! #MoonHoax #History #ScienceMystery
